refnamediv.refpurpose: Description of the gridbag constraints set of properties.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: constraints = createConstraints("gridbag") constraints = createConstraints("gridbag", grid) constraints = createConstraints("gridbag", grid, weight) constraints = createConstraints("gridbag", grid, weight, fill) constraints = createConstraints("gridbag", grid, weight, fill, anchor) constraints = createConstraints("gridbag", grid, weight, fill, anchor, padding) constraints = createConstraints("gridbag", grid, weight, fill, anchor, padding, preferredsize)

listitem.para: [pos_x, pos_y, width, height] a 1-by-4 matrix of double, [0, 0, 0, 0] by default.
pos_x and pos_x are the coordinates of the element on a virtual grid.
width and height are the width and height of the element on the virtual grid.
[weight_x, weight_y] a 1-by-2 matrix of doubles, [0, 0] by default.
The weights applied for the resize on either axes.
A larger value means the element will get more space during resize.
Indicates how to fill the available space during resize on either direction (or both).
Tells where to anchor the element when it is smaller than the area it is nested in.
[pad_x, pad_y] a 1-by-2 matrix of doubles, [0 0] by default
Padding between this element and elements around it.
[p_size_x, p_size_y] a 1-by-2 matrix of doubles, [-1 -1] by default
Preferred size in pixel when not constrained, used to avoid changing the size when resizing the nesting frame.
